timeline.message: Remove unnecessary rethrow as caught exception
Allow event id to be supplied when building events
Add transformation for deposit record premis
Add the name of agent as a slug to hash uri to allow for multiple agents of same type on an event. Only perform event detail formatting when more than zero arguments provided.
Add transformation for content object premis events. Add more premis types and software agents.
Pull premis test helper methods into test utility
Add services and commandline for executing premis transformation
Fix class path issues with jar. Add flags for premis tranformation. Add tests for transformation services
Catch illegal arg exception when setting date fields

timeline.author: bbpennel
